fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Trade, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, External Relations, Public Health, Food Safety
eu_initiatives: Food content legislations, for regenerated cellulose films and non edible cellulose casings. Note that the first food contact directive was on regenerated cellulose films last amended in OJ L172 of30.06.2007 p 74
organisation_name: COMITE INTERNATIONAL DE LA PELLICULE CELLULOSIQUE (CIPCEL)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Technical expert group for food contact materials#E03354#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3354#Member#C
relevant_communication: "Guide to good manufacturing practice for non edible cellulose casings', 2009
goals__remit:
- To improve and develop the use of the products manufactured, 
- To study and provide solutions to problems of common interest,  
- To maintain relations with all relevant private and public national and international organisations including governments.
